content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(-6, -50)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(-15.0, -50.0) and a wooden chest at position(-16.5, -49.5)

### Coal mine at position(43, -84)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(43.0, -84.0) and multiple wooden chests and stone furnaces at nearby positions

### Furnace group at position(40, -82)
Consists of multiple stone furnaces at positions(40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), and (40.0, -79.0), with corresponding wooden chests

### Electricity generator at position(10, 10)
Consists of a steam engine at position(10.5, 10.5), a boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5), and an offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5), connected by a pipe group with fluid system 26426

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67} and status EntityStatus.NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS

### Inserter group at position(3, 0)
Consists of multiple burner inserters at positions(3.5, 0.5) and (0.5, 3.5), with corresponding wooden chests

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel before attempting to mine
- Make sure to place the burner mining drill at a valid position with available resources

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has sufficient fuel and ingredients before attempting to smelt
- Make sure to place the furnace at a valid position with available resources

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine has a valid input liquid and fluid connections before attempting to generate electricity
- Make sure to place the steam engine at a valid position with available resources

### Errors when using electricity
- Ensure that the electricity group has a valid voltage and pole connections before attempting to use electricity
- Make sure to place the electricity poles at valid positions with available resources

### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure that the pipe group has a valid fluid system and connections before attempting to transport fluids
- Make sure to place the pipes at valid positions with available resources

### Errors when using inserters
- Ensure that the inserter has a valid pickup and drop position before attempting to insert items
- Make sure to place the inserter at a valid position with available resources

### Errors when using labs
- Ensure that the lab has a valid lab input and research in progress before attempting to research
- Make sure to place the lab at a valid position with available resources

### Errors when using chests
- Ensure that the chest has sufficient space and valid inventory before attempting to store items
- Make sure to place the chest at a valid position with available resources
